footerFootnote: Welcome to Rockfeather! We are Rockfeather. We use Data Visualization, Data Science, Data Engineering, Process Mining and Low-Code technology to build smart solutions. Together with our customers, we create best-in-class solutions for various industries and functions. Therefore, this is how we embrace technology and empower ambitious people.

paragraphs.headline: Introduction
values: Welcome to Rockfeather's Tech Radar, your compass in the ever-changing landscape of technology innovation. At Rockfeather, we pride ourselves on being pioneers in the digital realm, crafting solutions that redefine possibilities. In this dynamic tech radar, we unveil the cutting-edge technologies and methodologies propelling us toward the future.

Explore the intersections of creativity and functionality, where our team of experts curates a collection of transformative tools and approaches. Witness the evolution of languages, frameworks, tools, and methodologies, each meticulously chosen to empower your projects and elevate your business strategies.

paragraphs.headline: WIP - How to add a tool ?
values: The radar acts as an overview of technologies that we everyone should know about.

quadrants.description: Essential coding tools for data analysis
quadrants.name: Languages and frameworks

quadrants.description: Work-in-progress tools optimizing data processing tasks
quadrants.name: Tools

quadrants.description: Evolving techniques shaping precise data analysis strategies
quadrants.name: Methods

quadrants.description: Emerging services broadening data science applications
quadrants.name: Other services

rings.description: We can clearly recommend this technology. We have used it for longer period of time in different teams and it has proven to be stable and useful.
rings.name: Adopt

rings.description: We have used it with success and recommend to have a closer look at the technology in this ring. The goal of items here is to look at them more closely, with the goal to bring them to the adopt level.
rings.name: Trial

rings.description: We have tried it out and we find it promising. We recommend having a look at these items when you face a specific need for the technology in your project.
rings.name: Assess

rings.description: This category is a bit special. Unlike the others, we recommend to stop doing or using something. That does not mean that they are bad and it often might be ok to use them in existing projects. But we move things here if we think we shouldn't do them anymore - because we see better options or alternatives now.
rings.name: Hold

pageHelp.ringsPreDescription: Each of the items is classified in one of these rings:
